short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve your browsing experience on popular Israeli websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Israeli Site Enhancer is designed to improve your browsing experience on popular Israeli websites. Enhance readability, remove distractions, and optimize the viewing experience on websites like Mako, Ynet, Calcalist, and Walla. Enjoy a smoother and more enjoyable browsing experience with this powerful plugin.

This extension is also an ad-blocker for the sites mentioned above, but will not replace your regular ad-blocker.

This extension doesn't use any browsing information and only changes the relevant sites.
Walla.co.il
Ynet.co.il
Calcalist.co.il
Mako.co.il & N12
